nodes.text: Tor 7863 was a bulk freighter that was used by the company Tor-Ro-Bo Industries. At some point, Tor-Ro-Bo hired a group of spacers to smuggle some semi-processed TOL-type ore off of the planet 244Core and transport it to Tor 7863, in breach of a profit-sharing agreement that Tor-Ro-Bo had signed with the other corporations that operated on 244Core.
